 Destructor smiled..."My scanners are always notifing me of new comeings. An 
old friend of Mine Sphink has contacted me. He has told me the destrons are 
eager to side with us against the alliance. Als they have connections woth 
the others who will hopefully help us win over the maximals.. This is what we 
need."
